entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dolbeau-Mistassini
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.7°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 42 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
